metadata.title: CVE-2018-12436 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: wolfcrypt/src/ecc.c in wolfSSL before 3.15.1.patch allows a memory-cacheside-channel attack on ECDSA signatures, aka the Return Of the HiddenNumber Problem or ROHNP. To discover an ECDSA key, the attacker needsaccess to either the local machine or a different virtual machine on thesame physical host.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
